wikipedia_page.main: George Bartholomew Weeks (5 August 1902 – 28 June 1982) was an English footballer who played as a full back in the Football League for Brentford and Watford.

response: * George Weeks (footballer) (1902–1982), English football full back
* George Weeks (politician) (1836–1905), member of the Wisconsin State Assembly
* George Weeks (American football) (1918–1980), American football defensive end
